content: There is thread on Discourse about proof of concept real time simulator of surgery of soft tissues and whatever Julia can be used for it. Unfortunately, no one of us have competence about this topic, person that ask is new to Julia, can someone from SciML take a look at comment current state of discussion?
He would be grateful by even few words from someone that have true knowledge about SciML.
Those comments are so weird that I've read it and purposefully stayed out of it.
I appologize if my comments are werid. I try to make them as clear as I can.
It's like, yeah... wtf do you even want? :laughing:
